'''Gifts of Encounter''' is a [[:Category:Recurring Events|recurring]] [[event]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. It offers bonus rewards for [[HoYoLAB Community Daily Check-In]] and in some instances prize drawings for special rewards such as {{Item|Blessing of the Welkin Moon}}.
